name: Endless Abyss
description:
Keyboard: Left, Right, Up, E

Gamepad: Left Joystick, A, X

An adventurer, looking for fame and glory, discovers a massive underground pit. Hidden deep in in the depths are deadly traps, aggressive animals and monsters all ready to attack anybody foolish enough to venture through the pit.

With only a whip, his wits and the light of a torch this adventurer will see how far he can survive down the Endless Abyss.

  • Programming by @tekuzo
  • Pixel art by @tekuzo
  • 8-bit Platformer SFX commissioned by Mark McCorkle for OpenGameArt.org (https://opengameart.org/content/8-bit-platformer-sfx)
  • Sound Effects by @Shades
  • Music by wyver9
